name: Beats Fever (itch)
description:
Introduction

Beats Fever is a VR rhythm game set in charming world stages, where players enjoy stylish music and make cool moves to catch incoming notes.

  • Both HTC Vive and Oculus Rift are supported.
Highlights
  • Intuitive gameplay - just hit or slide on the notes (orbs)!
  • 4 beautiful and exciting metropolitan stages
  • 40 licensed music tracks of varied types
  • Fine-tuned timelines and move patterns
  • Great joy for friends & family

It is a drum & dance arcade game experience in VR, with polished graphics, energetic music, astonishing body moves, and endless fun!

System Requirements

Minimum

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
Note: Steam Keys Only
